Description: Content that promotes hatred, violence, or discrimination against individuals or groups based on their race, ethnicity, national origin, religion, gender, sexual orientation, age, disability, or other characteristics.
Content that depicts violence, gore, or graphic images, including but not limited to images of dead bodies, gore, or violent acts.
Content that depicts nudity, sex, or explicit material, including but not limited to images, videos, or text.
Content that is spam, misleading, or deceptive, including but not limited to fake or manipulated images
